overview: The Last Refuge For Elderly Parents Abandoned By Their Children, Apanjan Is An Old Age Home. The Film Revolves Around The Lives Of Apanjans Inhabitants, And How Karma Finds Its Way To Teach Their Ungrateful Children An Important Life Lesson.
tagline: Karma teaches the children of elderly parents a lesson after they commit some misdemeanours.
title: Dash Mash Dash Diner Galpo
